      ScoringConfiguration ScoringConfiguration.setBoostMode​(BoostMode boostMode)

      Set the list of scoring rules.
      ScoringConfiguration ScoringConfiguration.setScoreMode​(ScoreMode scoreMode)
      The score_mode specifies how the computed scores are combined.
